name: McAfee V Murder Hornets
description:
Welcome to McAfee V Murder Hornets!

Play as Pat McAfee and use your punting power to defeat the Murder Hornets!

Instructions

Use, WASD or the Arrow keys to move.

Press Space to kick balls!

Credits

Main Menu Music: w1x - Rolemusic

Gameplay Music:  Battle of Pogs - Komiku
